description: replace status of the specified ResourceQuota

parameters.description: fieldValidation determines how the server should respond to unknown/duplicate fields in the object in the request. Introduced as alpha in 1.23, older servers or servers with the `ServerSideFieldValidation` feature disabled will discard valid values specified in  this param and not perform any server side field validation. Valid values are: - Ignore: ignores unknown/duplicate fields. - Warn: responds with a warning for each unknown/duplicate field, but successfully serves the request. - Strict: fails the request on unknown/duplicate fields.
parameters.name: fieldValidation
